article_title: UpCounsel raises $10M to expand lawyer on-demand platform
article_text:
Thank you for your interest in licensing Fortune content. Please find information on various licensing contacts below and choose the one that best suits your needs:

1. To license Fortune articles, excerpts, or headlines for republication in various media (including books, eBooks, film, web, newsletters, newspapers, magazines and others), please email syndication@timeinc.com.

2. To license a Fortune cover, order reprint or e-print copies of an article or cover, or license an accolade, please contact PARS International at www.timeincreprints.com.

3. To license text only photocopies of Fortunearticles as print or digital handouts in academic settings, or in academic coursepacks, please contact the Copyright Clearance Center at www.copyright.com

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Jeff John Roberts

twitter.description: It was just a matter of time until the gig economy moved upmarket. It started with drivers and cleaners, who rely on tech platforms to sell their services, but now droves of white collar worker are...
twitter.title: UpCounsel raises $10M to grow on-demand lawyer platform

article_metadata.keywords: on-demand lawyer, upcounsel, matt faustman, legalzoom, rocket lawyer
article_metadata.description: Just as Uber offers a platform for driver, UpCounsel lets companies screen and hire lawyers – cutting out law firms in the process.
article_metadata.sailthru.title: UpCounsel raises $10M to grow on-demand lawyer platform
article_metadata.news_keywords: gig economy, UpCounsel, on-demand lawyer, lawyers, attorneys
